price: 你说：“我的主欲使谁的给养宽裕，就使他宽裕；欲使谁的给养窘迫，就使谁窘迫。但众人大半不知道。”
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّ رَبِّي يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقۡدِرُ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul inna rabbī yabsuṭu al-riz'qa liman yashāu wayaqdiru walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yaʿlamūna
